Package.Name: kernel-module-headers
Package.Summary: Kernel header files for external module building
Package.Description: kernel-module-headers includes the C header files and the necessary Kbuild files for being able to build external kernel modules.

Package.Name: kernel-headers
Package.Summary: Header files for the Linux kernel for use by glibc
Package.Description: kernel-headers includes the C header files that specify the interface between the Linux kernel and userspace libraries and programs. The header files define structures and constants that are needed for building most standard programs and are also needed for rebuilding the glibc package.

Package.Name: kernel-docs
Package.Summary: Documentation and scripts for the Linux kernel
Package.Description: kernel-docs includes several documentation files and scripts for managing several debugging and other tasks.

Package.Name: cpupowertools
Package.Description: cpupowertools contains utilities to manage power management and frequency scaling policies of modern CPUs.

Package.Name: perf
Package.Summary: Performance analyser tool that makes full use of the Linux performance counter subsystem
Package.Description: perf is a new tool which is used to optimize, validate and measure applications, workloads or the full system through the Linux performance counter subsystem.
